name: Sneaky-Cogs
author: snikay (snikay#7823)
description: The cogs in this repo primarly focus on custom automation - automating tidious tasks specific to only handful list of servers (will not be put on approved list - so use at your own risk). Most will not require command to trigger an event.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing my repo!
In case any bugs are found - report them on my GitHub here: <https://github.com/snikay/Sneaky-cogs>.
Additionally you can leave suggestions.
